text:
@JRubinBlogger @sugie266 He is "DONE" with his Covid-19 job, so maybe he is taking some vacation time. It was exhausting him for whatever it was he did beyond lifting some empty boxes for a photo op !!

Can you see pence helping Habitat for Humanity like 97-year-old President Jimmy Carter ???
